name: HITESH SADHU

my_business:
Who We are?
At Hit Solutions, we specialize in Accounting and Management Software. With 4 
years of experience, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional quality and 
customer satisfaction
top_product: Biz Analyst Mobile Application TallyPrime Business Management Software AWS Cloud Solutions Customization and Business Module
ideal_referral: Calcutta Auto Mobile Devine Auto Gas Pvt Ltd Ahmedabad Rifle Clube Association ASB Tubes Pvt Ltd
top_problem_solved: Not every client comes from BNI, but every success strengthens the value I bring to the network. Recently, I worked with Calcutta Auto Mobile, a large-scale business managing over 5500+ parties, 6200+ stock items, and 48,000+ past transactions. They were facing limitations with their old software (Busy). We successfully migrated their entire system to Tally, implemented role-based access for 18 users (3 accountants + 15 salesmen), and delivered custom product training to their entire team. Today, they run smoother operations with faster billing, better reporting, and complete control. This is the kind of value I aim to deliver to any referral shared within BNI.
my_favourite_bni_story: BNI Magic Moment – Hitesh Sadhu Through BNI, I met Sachin Patel — a complete stranger at first. During a casual 1-to-1, I mentioned my village name, and to our surprise, we both belong to the same native village! Even more amazing, we realized our clients and professional networks are unknowingly connected. What started as a business meeting turned into a rediscovery of a village friend and now a trusted business partner. BNI didn’t just grow my network — it reconnected me to my roots.
